title: Spike
summaries: Spikes are a type of trap block that deal 60 / 40 damage to players who come in contact with them. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, they additionally inflict the Bleeding debuff for 10 / 20 / 25 seconds. They can be found in the Dungeon and can be broken with a drill, pickaxe, or explosive. This is the only way to obtain them, as they are not craftable.
